thread.title: Cam Jordan reacts to NOPD decision against criminal charges
thread.title_full: Cam Jordan reacts to NOPD decision against criminal charges - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Cam Jordan reacts to NOPD decision against criminal charges
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - Saints defensive end Cam Jordan on Thursday addressed the NOPD's decision to not pursue criminal charges for an incident at a local night club.
“You can always have your standpoint of what you did, and I'm just glad that some of this is dissipating,” Jordan said. “I'm sure there's going to be more, because I believe they're referring it back to the DA. So, I hope the DA finds as much as the New Orleans police did. So, that being said, I'm still waiting to be completely exonerated.”
A complaint accused Jordan of swatting a woman's backside, then assaulting her boyfriend at the Republic club over Labor Dday weekend.
Jordan denied the allegations.
Copyright 2015 WVUE.
